title: 17th century English print culture
content:
The BBC website has downloadable audio for an interesting programme on print culture in 17th century England.:

[http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/history/inourtime/inourtime.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107161705/http:/www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/history/inourtime/inourtime.shtml "http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/history/inourtime/inourtime.shtml")
author: John Hudson
